g.text: Azure Hub and Spoke Network Topology Enterprise Architecture
Azure Virtual Network Manager Centralized Policy Management
Virtual Machine Windows Server 2022 4 vCPU, 16 GB RAM
Virtual Machine Linux Ubuntu 22.04 2 vCPU, 8 GB RAM
Hub Virtual Network 10.0.0.0/16 Central Services Management & Security
Azure Bastion Secure RDP/SSH Jump Host
Azure Firewall Premium SKU Threat Intelligence
Azure Monitor Log Analytics Application Insights
Production Spoke Virtual Network 1 10.1.0.0/16 Tier 1 Applications
Resource Subnet(s) Web, App, Data Tiers
Production Spoke Virtual Network 2 10.2.0.0/16 Tier 1 Applications
Resource Subnet(s) Web, App, Data Tiers
Resource Subnet(s) Dev, Test, Staging Environments
Resource Subnet(s) Dev, Test, Staging Environments

Technical Specifications: • Hub VNet: 10.0.0.0/16 • Production Spokes: 10.1.0.0/16, 10.2.0.0/16 • Non-Prod Spokes: 10.10.0.0/16, 10.11.0.0/16 • ExpressRoute: 1 Gbps Primary + Secondary • Firewall: Premium SKU with Threat Intelligence • Monitoring: 90-day retention, real-time alerts
Virtual Networks Connected or Peered Through Hub
Virtual Networks Connected or Peered Through Hub
Peered or Directly Connected Virtual Networks
